name: Johnny Bravo: Big Babe Adventure
storyline: It was a Friday night like any other in this Johnny Bravo’s Big Babe Adventure game. Our slick-haired “hero” was hanging out by the movie theater on chick-flick night, looking for cute babes. Sure enough, they filed out of the theater and onto a bus. Determined, he chased after them. They pulled up to a creepy-looking building. When he tried to follow them, he fell into an underground laboratory! This doesn’t look right, he thought. Are the babes okay? If he can save them, he’ll earn a smooch for sure.
